title: Preseason Crystal Ball Predictions
itunes:title: Preseason Crystal Ball Predictions
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling & Gregg Rosenthal – recap all the latest news from around the NFL including Devonta Freeman's five year contract extension, Jay Cutler impressing in Miami, and Charger's Cornerback Brandon Flowers retiring. The heroes also discuss what to watch during preseason Week 1.  Spoiler alert: our review of Hard Knocks Ep. 1 is here.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
